acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

nonces(address).details: Returns an the next unused nonce for an address.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.extraStorage: Number of additional storage units to rent.

params.recovery: Address which can recover the fid. Set to zero to disable recovery.

params.extraStorage: Number of additional storage units to rent.
params.recovery: Address which can recover the fid. Set to zero to disable recovery.
Address which can recover the fid. Set to zero to disable recovery.
params.sig: EIP-712 Register signature signed by the to address.
params.to: Address which will own the fid.

params.extraStorage: Number of additional storage units to rent.
params.recovery: Address which can recover the fid. Set to zero to disable recovery.
params.sig: EIP-712 Register signature signed by the to address.
params.to: Address which will own the fid.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

VERSION().notice: Contract version specified in the Farcaster protocol version scheme.

addGuardian(address).notice: Add an address as a guardian. Only callable by owner.

constructor.notice: Configure IdRegistry and StorageRegistry addresses.         Set the owner of the contract to the provided _owner.

domainSeparatorV4().notice: Helper view to read EIP-712 domain separator.

guardians(address).notice: Mapping of addresses to guardian status.

hashTypedDataV4(bytes32).notice: Helper view to hash EIP-712 typed data onchain.

pause().notice: Pause the contract. Only callable by owner or a guardian.

price().notice: Calculate the total price to register, equal to 1 storage unit.

price(uint256).notice: Calculate the total price to register, including additional storage.

register(address).notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to the caller. The caller must not have an fid.

register(address,uint256).notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to the caller and rent additional storage.         The caller must not have an fid.

registerFor(address,address,uint256,byte.notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to any address. A signed message from the address         must be provided which approves both the to and the recovery. The address must not         have an fid.

Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to any address and rent additional storage.         A signed message from the address must be provided which approves both the to         and the recovery. The address must not have an fid.

removeGuardian(address).notice: Remove a guardian. Only callable by owner.

setStorageRegistry(address).notice: Set the StorageRegistry address. Only callable by owner.

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract. Only callable by owner.

useNonce().notice: Increase caller's nonce, invalidating previous signatures.
